Yii Framework v2.0.0-dev Class Reference

Interface yii\db\ActiveRelationInterface

All Classes | Methods
Implemented byyii\db\ActiveRelation, yii\redis\ActiveRelation
Available since version2.0
Source Code
ActiveRelationInterface defines the common interface to be implemented by active record relation classes.

A class implementing this interface should also use yii\db\ActiveRelationTrait.

Public Methods

Hide inherited methods

MethodDescriptionDefined By
via() Specifies the relation associated with the pivot table. yii\db\ActiveRelationInterface

Method Details

via() method
static via( $relationName, $callable = null )
$relationName string The relation name. This refers to a relation declared in \yii\db\primaryModel.
$callable callable A PHP callback for customizing the relation associated with the pivot table. Its signature should be function($query), where $query is the query to be customized.
return static the relation object itself.

Specifies the relation associated with the pivot table.
